Sentencas: Oxy-apatites are promising electrolyte materials for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells, IT-SOFC.

Sentencas: However the requirements of electrolytes make necessary the preparation of dense films with the appropriated composition to show good electrical properties; in this way, colloidal processing is a key issue.
